Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws

A framework for the Web Services (WS).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WebServiceCaller.ReuseHttpClient
    An empty interface which states that the underlying HttpClient instance should be reused for all HTTP requests, instead of creating a new one each time.
    WebServiceClient
    A minimalist contract when creating a web service client.
    WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.IOStreamerSourceKey<ParameterType>
    A source key which is able to define a specific URI for a business entity when it is searched on an Business.Source#IOStreamer source, i.e. through a {#link Business.IOStreamer.
    WSUriStreamParser.SourceKey<UriType,ParameterType>
    Is responsible for returning a key corresponding to a business object entity, in order to be able to access to it later on.
    WSUriStreamParser.UriStreamerSourceKey<ParameterType>
    A source key which is able to define a specific URI for a business entity when it is searched on an Business.Source#UriStreamer source, i.e. through a {#link Business.UriStreamParser.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WebServiceCaller
    A basis class for making web service calls easier.
    WebServiceCaller.SensibleHttpClient
    Overrides the default DefaultHttpClient by disabling the cookies storing.
    WebServiceClient.CallType
    Defines the way the HTTP method is run, and enables to link a call code with it.
    WebServiceClient.HttpCallTypeAndBody
    Indicates the type of HTTP request and the underlying HTTP.
    WithCacheWSUriStreamParser  
    WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CacheableWebUriStreamParser<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>  
    WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CachedWebUriStreamParser<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>  
    WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.SimpleIOStreamerSourceKey<ParameterType>
    A basic implementation of the WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.IOStreamerSourceKey.
    WSUriStreamParser<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    An abstract class which implements its interface via web service calls.
    WSUriStreamParser.KeysAggregator<ParameterType>
    A WSUriStreamParser.SourceKey aggregator, which redirects the computing of a business object entity URI depending on the Business.Source it is asked for.
    WSUriStreamParser.SimpleUriStreamerSourceKey<ParameterType>
    A basic implementation of the WSUriStreamParser.UriStreamerSourceKey.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WebServiceClient.Verb
    An HTTP method type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WebServiceClient.CallException
    The exception that will be thrown if any problem occurs during a web service call.

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws Description

A framework for the Web Services (WS).
